item.title: Training Ground Guru | Carsley appointed England U21s coach, with Cole as assistant
item.description: LEE CARSLEY has been appointed as England’s Under-21s Head Coach, with Ashley Cole as his assistant.

item.title: Training Ground Guru | Former Rochdale manager Barry-Murphy takes charge of Man City U23s
item.description: FORMER Rochdale manager Brian Barry-Murphy has been appointed as Manchester City’s new Under-23s boss as the club unveiled their coaching set-up for the new season.

item.title: Training Ground Guru | Lancashire returns to Southampton as B team player and mentor
item.description: OLLY LANCASHIRE has returned to Southampton as a player and mentor for their B team. The 32-year-old centre-back, who has played more than 300 senior games, made 17 appearances for Saints at the start of his career.

item.title: Training Ground Guru | Ferguson replaces Plunkett as Head of Coaching at Reading
item.description: ANTHONY FERGUSON has left AFC Wimbledon to become Head of Coaching at Category One Reading. He replaces Carl Plunkett, who left the Royals to join Crystal Palace in February.

item.title: Training Ground Guru | Paul McShane, 35, returns to Manchester United as U23s player-coach
item.description: FORMER Republic of Ireland international Paul McShane has returned to Manchester United as a player-coach with their Under-23s.

item.title: Training Ground Guru | Harley reunited with Benitez as Head of Sport Science at Everton
item.description: JAMIE HARLEY has been reunited with manager Rafa Benitez as Head of Sport Science at Everton. The duo worked together at Newcastle United during the Spaniard’s three years in charge of the Magpies.

item.title: Training Ground Guru | TGG Podcast #28: Russell Martin - People and purpose at MK Dons
item.description: IN just 20 months, Russell Martin has marked himself out as one of the most interesting and original English managers in the game. He told TGG more about his approach, covering topics including Buddhism, politics, playing without fear, work-life balance and the importance of sticking to Plan A.

item.title: Training Ground Guru | Bruno Lage unveils new backroom staff at Wolves
item.description: WOLVES manager Bruno Lage has announced his backroom team at Molineux, bringing in six new staff.

item.title: Training Ground Guru | How Hoffenheim are helping to democratise tracking data
item.description: HOFFENHEIM have been described as the most innovative club in football. Now they‘re working on a solution to democratise tracking data.

item.title: Training Ground Guru | New appointments mark change of direction for Crystal Palace
item.description: PATRICK VIEIRA has made the first appointments to his backroom team as he looks to move Crystal Palace in a new direction.

item.title: Training Ground Guru | Jennings becomes Head of Football Development in Fulham restructure
item.description: FULHAM have announced a restructure of their Category One Academy, with Huw Jennings stepping down as Academy Director after 12 years to take on a new Head of Football Development role.

item.title: Training Ground Guru | Harper succeeds Joyce as Newcastle Academy Manager
item.description: STEVE HARPER has been appointed as permanent Academy Manager at Newcastle United. He replaces Joe Joyce, who was stood down from the role in February.

item.title: Training Ground Guru | Lee Cattermole: ‘Back to school‘ at Middlesbrough‘s Academy
item.description: FORMER Premier League midfielder Lee Cattermole tells TGG about his transition from player to coach.

item.title: Training Ground Guru | Benitez makes first appointments to Everton backroom staff
item.description: RAFA BENITEZ has made the first two appointments to his Everton backroom team, with long-time lieutenants Paco de Miguel and Antonio Gomez returning to work alongside him.

item.title: Training Ground Guru | Stone replaces Loughlan as first-team coach at Burnley
item.description: BURNLEY‘S Steve Stone has stepped up from the Under-23s to replace Tony Loughlan as first-team coach at the club.

item.title: Training Ground Guru | Jokanovic appoints assistants at Sheffield United
item.description: NEW Sheffield United boss Slaviša Jokanovic has made the first appointments to his backroom team, with Chema Sanz joining as first-team coach, Rafa Cristobal as Head of Performance and Marco Cesarini as Head of Medical.

item.title: Training Ground Guru | Chelsea‘s Ramsay appointed as Man Utd‘s first set piece coach
item.description: CHELSEA Under-23s assistant Eric Ramsay has been appointed as Manchester United’s first set piece specialist and individual development coach.

item.title: Training Ground Guru | Walsh appointed Head of Sport Science at Newcastle United
item.description: CALLUM WALSH has left Huddersfield Town to become the new Head of Sport Science at Newcastle United.

item.title: Training Ground Guru | Man City‘s Jover replaces Georgson as Arsenal set piece specialist
item.description: SET PIECE specialist Nicolas Jover has left Manchester City after two years and replaced Andreas Georgson on the staff at Arsenal.

item.title: Training Ground Guru | Mourinho takes sacked Spurs assistants to Roma
item.description: JOSE MOURINHO has assembled his backroom team at Roma, with the four assistants who left Tottenham with him in April reunited in the Italian capital.

item.title: Training Ground Guru | Nuno takes Wolves trio to Tottenham
item.description: NUNO ESPIRITO SANTO has named his backroom staff at Tottenham, with trio Ian Cathro, Rui Barbosa and Antonio Dias reunited with him from Wolves.

item.title: Training Ground Guru | McKinlay and Davies back with Moyes at West Ham
item.description: DAVID MOYES has beefed up his backroom team at West Ham with the return of two former assistants.

item.title: Training Ground Guru | Carlos Vicens replaces Brian Kidd as Manchester City assistant
item.description: BRIAN KIDD has left Manchester City after 12 years, with Under-18s coach Carlos Vicens stepping up to take his place as assistant manager.

item.title: Training Ground Guru | Marco Silva reunites his Everton staff at Fulham
item.description: MARCO SILVA is bringing the same assistants who worked with him at Everton to Fulham, TGG understands.

item.title: Training Ground Guru | How SC Cambuur are using AI to bridge the gap in the Eredivisie
item.description: NEWLY-PROMOTED SC Cambuur hope a new platform that fuses computer vision and sensor technology can help them bridge the gap with the big boys in Holland‘s Eredivisie.

item.title: Training Ground Guru | Neville returns to club football with Oxford United
item.description: CHRIS NEVILLE, one of the most experienced performance practitioners in English football, has returned to the club game as Head of Performance at Oxford United.

item.title: Training Ground Guru | Quartet leave Bournemouth after over 50 years‘ combined service
item.description: ASSISTANT Stephen Purches, first-team coach Simon Weatherstone, Head Physio Steve Hard and goalkeeper coach Neil Moss have left Bournemouth following the arrival of Head Coach Scott Parker and his staff.

item.title: Training Ground Guru | Gill joins MK Dons as Strategic and Technical Development Coach
item.description: FORMER Ipswich Town first-team coach Matt Gill has joined MK Dons in the new role of Strategic and Technical Development Coach.

item.title: Training Ground Guru | Harris leaves Fulham after 11 years following Parker exit
item.description: FULHAM Head of Performance Alastair Harris has left the club after 11 years along with manager Scott Parker and four other members of his backroom staff.

item.title: Training Ground Guru | Nick Davies: Head of Performance leaves West Brom after three years
item.description: NICK DAVIES has left West Brom after three years as their Head of Performance. The decision follows the arrival of Valerien Ismail as Head Coach last week.

item.title: Training Ground Guru | Garcia appointed Head of Performance at Watford
item.description: JORDI GARCIA has been appointed as Head of Performance at newly-promoted Watford. The Spaniard, who has previously worked at Barcelona and Real Madrid, replaces compatriot Moises de Hoyo, who left at the end of last season for family reasons.

item.title: Training Ground Guru | Gardner appointed Technical Director by Birmingham
item.description: CRAIG GARDNER has been appointed Technical Director by Birmingham City, just a year after retiring from playing.

item.title: Training Ground Guru | Portsmouth own training ground for first time after Hilsea deal
item.description: PORTSMOUTH own their training ground for the first time in their history after acquiring the freehold for their Hilsea facility and surrounding land from Roko health clubs.

item.title: Training Ground Guru | TGG Podcast #27: Michael Beale - Helping to rejuvenate Rangers
item.description: MICHAEL BEALE gives an insight into the training ground methods that helped Rangers land their first title in a decade.

item.title: Training Ground Guru | Time for Academies to reconnect with the inner cities?
item.description: ASTON VILLA are pressing on with plans to open an Inner City Academy which will provide greater opportunities for kids in working class areas of Birmingham. Is it time for other clubs to follow suit?

item.title: Training Ground Guru | Manisha Tailor breaks new ground with promotion at QPR
item.description: MANISHA TAILOR has been promoted to Assistant Head of Coaching at QPR, making her the first woman and first person of South Asian heritage to hold such a role in the English game.

item.title: Training Ground Guru | Dowling leaves West Brom as club ‘reassess football operation‘
item.description: WEST BROM Sporting Director Luke Dowling has left after three years at The Hawthorns as the club “reassess how our football operation functions”.

item.title: Training Ground Guru | EXCLUSIVE: Balsom to leave Leicester City after 13 years
item.description: HEAD of Performance Innovation Paul Balsom will end his 13-year association with Leicester City and owners King Power when his contract expires at the end of the month.

item.title: Training Ground Guru | Rhys Carr: Insights from an Individual Development Coaching pioneer
item.description: RHYS CARR has been an Individual Development Coach for the last four seasons - with Bristol City and then Sheffield United. He gave TGG some insights into what this important new role involves.

item.title: Training Ground Guru | Paratici joins Tottenham as club return to Sporting Director model
item.description: ITALIAN Fabio Paratici has joined Tottenham as Managing Director, Football, as the club return to the Sporting Director model they jettisoned in September 2015.

item.title: Training Ground Guru | Crystal Palace first-team coach Dave Reddington joins AGF
item.description: CRYSTAL PALACE first-team coach Dave Reddington has left the club after eight seasons to become assistant manager at AGF in Denmark.

item.title: Training Ground Guru | Sleep sessions that helped get Emiliano back on track
item.description: PLAY-OFF hero Emiliano Marcondes explains the work he did with sleep scientist Anna West that helped to get his Brentford career back on track.

item.title: Training Ground Guru | Academy Manager Jon Pepper leaves Burnley after five years
item.description: BURNLEY Academy Manager Jon Pepper, who led the Clarets from Category Three to One, is leaving the club after five years.

item.title: Training Ground Guru | EXCLUSIVE: England Under-17s coach Cochrane joins Manchester United
item.description: ENGLAND Under-17s coach Justin Cochrane has been appointed Head of Player Development and Coaching at Manchester United’s Academy.

item.title: Training Ground Guru | Aguero gifts luxury watch to every member of Man City staff
item.description: SERGIO AGUERO has given an engraved luxury watch to every member of Manchester City’s first-team staff, as well as raffling his Range Rover, which was won by kit manager Ally Marland.

item.title: Training Ground Guru | Watford Head of Performance leaves after four months
item.description: WATFORD Head of Performance Moises de Hoyo is leaving the club after four months after “one of the most difficult decisions in my life.”

item.title: Training Ground Guru | Jennings and Ashworth win 2021 Eamonn Dolan Award
item.description: HUW JENNINGS and Dan Ashworth have received the 2021 Eamonn Dolan Award for their outstanding contribution to youth development.
